pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detecting Politeness Features in Text // Detecting markers of politeness in English natural language. This package allows researchers to easily visualize and quantify politeness between groups of documents. This package combines prior research on the linguistic markers of politeness (Brown Levinson, 1987 http://psycnet.apa.org/record/1987-97641-000; Danescu- Niculescu-Mizil et al., 2013 arXiv:1306.6078; Voigt et al., 2017 doi:10.1073/pnas.1702413114). We thank the Spencer Foundation, the Hewlett Foundation, and Harvard's Institute for Quantitative Social Science for support.
